Langevin 算法是一种简单而强大的概率分布采样方法。它是一些机器学习方法（例如扩散模型和差分隐私学习）的关键要素。在这篇文章中，我将在以下特殊情况下对该方法进行简单的收敛分析：...</p>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023- 06-08:/00ecc20b52cc75fb3f8237abed36c290d2ab99b498860116de11f414377a3509</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Spyder gets CZI grant to add remote development features, and a new job opening!</stitle>;<updated>;2023-06-08T00:00 :00Z</updated>;<作者>;<名称>;Spyder 博客</名称>;<uri>;https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https: //www.spyder-ide.org/blog/czi-grant/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;在过去几年中，Spyder 将自己定位为流行的数据科学 IDE 将交互式计算和易用性与强大的编程工具相结合。然而，与其他一些 IDE 相比，有限的远程开发支持阻碍了采用，因为许多用户希望在个人计算机上进行开发时，在高性能计算 (HPC) 集群或 AWS、GCP 或 DigitalOcean 等云提供商上处理数据和代码。添加这些功能将使科学界能够从其本地开发环境的简便性和效率来处理数据和计算密集型编程任务，从而开辟许多新的研究可能性。感谢 <a href="https://chanzuckerberg.com/">;Chan Zuckerberg Initiative</a>; 的两年资助，我们现在能够解决这个缺陷。</p>; <p>;对现在，用户有两个主要选项可以使用本地 IDE 进行远程工作（除了纯粹基于 Web 浏览器的方法，这种方法有时不可用或不理想）： 他们可以在终端中编辑和执行文件，这不是< /p>; <a href="https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/czi-grant/">;（续...）</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;< id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-06:/59f44f95949a93840e187c6ebe68378ab4a1d7eef036504393e6269eb5e32416</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;如何构建机器学习模型训练管道</stitle>;<更新>;2023-06 - 06T12:40:58Z</更新>;<作者>;<名称>;neptune.ai</名称>;<uri>;https://neptune.ai/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https:// neptune.ai/blog/building-ml-model-training-pipeline"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;如果您曾经花费数小时来整理凌乱的脚本或感觉像你一边在寻找幽灵，一边试图修复那个难以捉摸的错误，而你的模型却要花很长时间来训练。我们都经历过这样的情况，对吧？但现在，想象一个不同的场景：干净的代码。简化的工作流程。高效的模型训练。太好了…</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-06:/73f4ae1d736e2ece8bcb59018e7c98dc8db44ddab65d94cab895a4638e91ff10</id>;<title xml:lang="en" >;变形金刚代理：自动化一切的人工智能工具</stitle>;<更新>;2023-06-06T11:57:00Z</更新>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata .com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/06/transformers-agent.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;我们在市场上推出了一款名为 <code>;Transformers Agent</code>; 的新 AI 工具，它功能非常强大，几乎可以自动执行您能想到的任何任务。它可以生成和编辑图像、视频、音频、回答有关文档的问题、将语音转换为文本以及执行许多其他操作。</p>; <p>;<b>;Hugging Face</b>;，一个众所周知的名字在开源人工智能领域，发布了 Transformers Agent，它在 Transformers 之上提供了自然语言 API。 API 设计为易于使用。通过一行代码，它提供了执行自然语言任务的多种工具，例如问答、图像生成、视频生成、文本转语音、文本分类和摘要。</p>; <content type =“ html” xml：lang =“ en”>; <p>;在这篇文章中，我们已经详细介绍了自动录取。到本教程结束时，您不仅可以了解它的工作原理，而且还可以在系统上运行它。 Auto-GPT在媒体上广受欢迎。在<code>; chatgpt </code>;之后，它已成为各种社交媒体平台上最受关注的主题之一。它不仅吸引了人们在人工情报界的关注，而且吸引了来自其他背景的人们。各个国家/地区的媒体媒体介绍了它如何自动化所有内容从简单到复杂的任务。</p>; <img>; <div>; <span>;目录的目录</span>; </span>; </div>; <hr>; <hr>; <div>;什么是 AutoGPT？ <P>; AutoGPT是一个实验性开源项目，建立在最新的ChatGpt型号IE GPT-4上。它不仅限于chatgpt，因为它也可以进行Web搜索并尝试从Internet找到信息。当客户为我们提供一个有关该怎么办的说明的项目时。作为分析师，我们执行任务以满足项目要求。</p>; <content type =“ html” xml：lang =“ en”>; <p>;在这篇文章中，我们将解释开源GPT-4模型如何工作以及如何将它们用作替代方案到商业OpenAI GPT-4解决方案。每天都会出现新的开源大语模型（LLM），并且列表越来越大。我们将介绍这两个模型<code>; gpt-4版本的羊驼</code>;和<code>; vicuna </code>;。本教程包括模型的工作，以及它们使用Python </p>; <div>; <span>;目录的实现</span>; </div>; </div>; <hr>; <hr>; <div>; Vicuna模型介绍：Vicuna Model < P>; Vicuna是公开可用的第一个可与GPT-4输出相当的开源模型。它在Meta的Llama 13B模型上进行了微调，并从ShareGPT收集的对话数据集。 sharegpt是人们与他人共享他们的聊天对话的网站。</p>; <p>; spyder的变量浏览器是一个很好的工具，可以通过显示所有变量来帮助开发和调试Python代码从当前范围。可变资源管理器缺少的一件事是能够在调试时显示任意，可定义表达式的值的能力。例如，查看对象的特定属性的值或在某些索引时数组的值可能很有用。这样的功能被称为其他集成开发环境（IDE）中的“监视清单”或“手表”。这篇博客文章介绍了为Spyder开发的手表插件。</p>;功能<p>;手表列表由用户确定的表达式列表组成。在每个调试器步骤之后对它们进行评估，并且评估的结果显示为字符串。这意味着<code>; value = str（eval（expression））</code>;在幕后执行，结果显示在插件中。监视列表是一个非常强大的工具，但这是有代价的：表达式的任何副作用都会影响执行环境。</p>; <p>;表达式可以是</p>; <a href =“ https：// www.spyder-ide.org/blog/introducing-watchlist-plugin/“>;（续...）</a>; We are pleased to announce our roadmap for the rest of 2022, and that two proposals were funded!</p>; The roadmap <p>;Considering the importance of sharing a clear perspective of where the Spyder project is going and where we will be focusing our efforts over the coming months, the team has created <a href="https://github.com/spyder-ide/spyder/wiki/Roadmap">;an initial roadmap for the rest of 2022</a>;. We prioritized the highlighted features and enhancements based on input from issues, face-to-face and virtual discussions, Stack Overflow, social media and other feedback, to try to best capture the interests of our users and community.</p>; The proposals <p>;To help make our roadmap achievable, we wrote and submitted proposals to several different venues and organizations in the last couple of months. Effects of Air Pollution is devastating and its harmful effects are not just limited to Humans but also animals and plants as well. It also leads to global warming which is esentially increasing air and ocean temperatures around the world.</p>; <p>;Indian cities have been topping the list of polluted cities. In order to solve the problem of air pollution the most important thing is to track air pollution on real-time basis first which alerts people to avoid outdoor activities during high air Pollution. This post explains how you can fetch real-time Air Quality Index (AQI) of Indian cities using Python and R code. It allows both Python and R programmers to pull pollution data.</p>; <img>; <p>;You can download the <a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepanshu88/Datasets/master/UploadedFiles/stations.csv">;dataset</a>; which contains static information about Indian states, cities and AQI stations. Variables stored in this dataset will be used further to fetch real-time data. </p>; <pre>;<code>; </code>;</pre>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/07/pollution-in-india-real-time-aqi-data.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-07-09:/a7a6ffb5ae09288dc19e59c97ce35ee0bccfa35252ca675a7dfe6955e9dec713</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;My Mayavi story: discovering open source communities</stitle>;<updated>;2022-07-09T22:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Gaël Varoquaux - programming</name>;<uri>;https://gael-varoquaux.info/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://gael-varoquaux.info/programming/my-mayavi-story-discovering-open-source-communities.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;<em>;The Mayavi Python software, and my personal history: A thread on Python and scipy ecosystems, building open source codebase, and meeting really cool and friendly people</em>;</p>; <img>; <p>;I am writing today as a goodbye to the project: I used to be one of the core contributors and maintainers but have been …</p>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-06-30:/6e74c86ed8127e22594e4ebfa1af7623d58f5792b9c48a86fc26a46029725e61</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Pointwise mutual information (PMI) in NLP</stitle>;<updated>;2022-06-30T14:04:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata.com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/06/pointwise-mutual-information-pmi.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;Natural Language Processing (NLP) has secured so much acceptance recently as there are many live projects running and now it's not just limited to academics only. Use cases of NLP can be seen across industries like understanding customers' issues, predicting the next word user is planning to type in the keyboard, automatic text summarization etc. Many researchers across the world trained NLP models in several human languages like English, Spanish, French, Mandarin etc so that benefit of NLP can be seen in every society. In this post we will talk about one of the most useful NLP metric called Pointwise mutual information (PMI) to identify words that can go together along with its implementation in Python and R.</p>; <div>; <span>;<b>;Table of Contents</b>;</span>; </div>; <hr>; <div>; What is Pointwise mutual information? <p>;PMI helps us to find related words. In other words, it explains how likely the co-occurrence of two words than we would expect by chance. Numpy also bring efficiency in Python programming. While using numpy you may encounter this error <code>;<b>;TypeError: only size-1 arrays can be converted to Python scalars</b>;</code>; It is one of the frequently appearing error and sometimes it becomes a daunting challenge来解决它。 <div>;<a href="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjK6v1uF56-eE2H3W9kCqAfvA_AnTjFSwQMUAAmeSl6wGNf1B93d0t7hYGyjPVzWXwBhawVc3ybXCkGvrVvaXEDYSUKM5tevLPkCTu-Bof0y5BtM-b_QG6BXm3r0tg854h8dfur3ExNNbm87oh4rJdAh93cFPLt5-WtvVrgsckYJFo84axC_9HWdE6xKw/s1600/pyerror.PNG">;<img>;</a>;</div>; Meaning : Only Size 1 Arrays Can Be Converted To Python Scalars Error This error generally appears when Python expects a single value but you passed an array which consists of multiple values. For example : you want to calculate exponential value of an array but the function for exponential value was designed for scalar variable (which means single value). When you pass numpy array in the function, it will return this error. This error handling is to prevent your code to process further and avoids unexpected output from the <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/05/only-size-1-arrays-can-be-converted-to-python-scalars.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-05-04:/d3640953c2d636b467deca8bd29431a25067e36eb1f95f7bf7a380a0bd0690f4</id>;<title
